casebody.data:
W. E. RIGGS, Jr., v. ST. LOUIS-SAN FRANCISCO RAILWAY COMPANY, a corporation, et al. No. 6399. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Dec. 20, 1960. Stubbs & Douglas, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellant. Franklin & Harmon, Oklahoma City, Okl., James L. Homire, St. Louis, Mo., and Robert D. Looney, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before MURRAH, Chief Judge, and BREITENSTEIN, Circuit Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed for failure of appellant diligently to prosecute.
